original_text:
before he had made the earth with its fields,
    or the first of the dust of the world.
korean_text: 하나님이 아직 땅도, 들도, 세상 진토의 근원도 짓지 아니하셨을 때에라

sentences.original_text: before he had made the earth with its fields
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 땅과 그 들판들을 만드시기 전에

sentences.original_text: or the first of the dust of the world
